-This folder should contain the libjpeg
-Specifically tow folders:
-include that contains the following jpeg header files:
+jpeglib.h,jconfig,jerror,jinclude,jmorecfg,jpegint.
-lib folder that contains the libjpeg builds:
+libjpeg.a,......
However, these dependencies can be installed anywhere else on
your PC.
You would have to edit the build file accordingly.
